prompts: Create a cute Electric-type Pokemon with bright colors and large ears.
Show me a small, cheerful Pokemon that loves to help others in battle.
Imagine a Pokemon that uses its electric powers to cheer up its friends.
Design a playful character with long ears and a happy expression.
Generate an adorable creature that thrives in grassy fields and forests.
Make a Pokemon with an energetic personality, perfect for contests and battles.
Give me a tiny Pokemon that sparks joy with its electric abilities.
